SELECT rsvDetailCode ,rsvDetailSpace ,okayStoreCode ,okaySpaceType ,okaySpaceName ,rsvDetailItem ,itemTotalName ,rsvDetailNum ,rsvDetailOnePrice
FROM tbPayment AS p INNER join tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode INNER join tbRsvRelation AS l ON r.rsvCode = l.rsvRelationRsvCode INNER join tbRsvDetail AS d ON l.rsvRelationRsvDetailCode = d.rsvDetailCode INNER join tbOkaySpace AS o ON d.rsvDetailSpace = o.okaySpaceCode Left join tbItemTotalAmount AS t ON d.rsvDetailItem = t.itemCode WHERE p.paymentCode = #{payCode};

SELECT paymentCode ,paymentRsvCode ,paymentPrice ,rsvUserId ,rsvUserName ,rsvState ,rsvUserPhone FROM tbPayment AS p INNER join tbRsv AS r on p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode WHERE p.paymentCode = #{paymentCode};

SELECT rsvCode , rsvUserId , rsvUserName , rsvUserPhone , rsvUserEmail , rsvUserRequest , rsvTotalPrice , rsvStartDateTime , rsvEndDateTime , rsvRegDate , rsvState FROM tbRsv WHERE rsvCode = #{rsvCode};
SELECT pointCode , pointID , pointAddList , pointSellList , pointList , pointPaymentCode , reviewCodepointReviewCode , pointModyfiDate FROM tbPointList

paymentCode ,paymentRsvCode ,paymentPrice , paymentUsePoint , paymentUseMoney , paymentAddPoint , paymentIP , paymentRegDate
FROM tbPayment
SELECT SUM(pointList) FROM tbPointList WHERE pointID = #{pointID}
